title: 2. Nested Routing

steps.heading: Create a React application with nested routes:
steps: /dashboard/profile - Displays a “Profile” component inside the Dashboard.
/dashboard/settings - Displays a “Settings” component inside the Dashboard.

title: 3. Dynamic Routing

steps: Create a route /user/:id that displays a “User Profile” component. The id parameter should dynamically fetch and display the user's details (mock data).

hints: Use useParams from react-router-dom to access the id.
Display a user's details dynamically based on the URL.
